bibl.title: Bone Objects from Polish Excavations at Kom el-Dikka, Alexandria (1988-1990). Part I. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: 12 plaques with pictorial and architectural decoration, and 1 doll, mostly found in houses of the Late Roman habitation quarter.
bibl.seg: JABLONOWSKA-TARACHA Jolanta, Bone Objects from Polish Excavations at Kom el-Dikka, Alexandria (1988-1990). Part I. Avec résumé en anglais.
Archeologia 51 (2000) pp. 51-60, 10 figg. et pll. VIII-XII.
12 plaques with pictorial and architectural decoration, and 1 doll, mostly found in houses of the Late Roman habitation quarter.
